hotels.title: Historic Countryside Manor Retreat near Winchester
hotels.description: Experience old-world glamour and modern comfort with a relaxing stay at Norton Park Hotel & Spa, a lovingly restored manor house awash with historic charm. Set across 54 acres of glorious Hampshire countryside, with the historic city of Winchester close by, this serene hotel invites you to embrace the countryside lifestyle - with the UK's south coast, London and historic Bath all within driving distance. Here you’ll find a collection of tastefully renovated, boutique-inspired rooms, spread across the original 16th-century manor house and a contemporary wing. Each one boasts antique décor and historic allure, including feature wallpapers, statement beds, and dark wood headboards - as well as modern luxuries. A host of amenities awaits to wow you, including the tranquil spa and health club, heated pool, gym and a large restaurant.
